Package controller

Class TicketController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.TicketController
  • public class TicketController
extends java.lang.Object
    A control class that will handle methods relating to the Ticket model. It allows for creation and addition for the Ticket objects, and updates the database accordingly each time. The seating plan also reflects the updates each time.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lim Wai Leong, Oh Jun Teng, Edhie Wahidin Michelle, Myat Hmu Khin
    See Also:
    CurrentTicket, SeatingPlan

      • TicketController

        public TicketController()

    • Method Detail

      • buyTicket

        public static int buyTicket​(int showtimeID,
                            int x,
                            int y)
        Carries out purchase of ticket by customer when given showtimeID and x and y coordinates of desired seat.
        Parameters:
        showtimeID - Unique showtimeID of target showtime
        x - X-coordinate of seat
        y - Y-coordinate of seat
        Returns:
        -1 if seat is already occupied.
        1 if purchase was successful.
        See Also:
        CurrentTicket

      • addTicket

        public static CurrentTicket addTicket​(int showtimeID,
                                      java.lang.String movietitle,
                                      int isAdult)
        Creates Ticket object according to showtimeID, age of movie-goer, and title of movie given. Will also write ticket details into ticket database, as well as increment TicketSales in movie database to reflect sales of new tickets, as well as in the appropriate Movie object.
        Parameters:
        showtimeID - Unique ID of showtime selected by customer
        movietitle - Title of movie selected by customer
        isAdult - Selection between age categories. 1 for child, 2 for adult and 3 for senior prices.
        Returns:
        Newly created Ticket object.
        See Also:
        CurrentTicket, Movie.increaseTicketSalesByOne()
